# King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Center

| leader_title             = Supervisor General
| leader_name              = Abdullah A. Al Rabeeah

King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Center (KSRelief) was established by King Salman bin Abdulaziz in 2015. The Supervisor General of the KSRelief is Abdullah bin Abdulaziz Al Rabeeah. The center was established in the framework of the Saudiâ€™s efforts to alleviate the suffering of those in need worldwide.
